alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 05 at 9:48PM EDT until September 07 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Heavy rainfall has caused Horse Creek in Arcadia water levels to continue to rise, but is expected to crest overnight in minor flood stage. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Buildings in Hidden Acres flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 PM EDT Monday was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.8 feet on 10/01/1979. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Horse Creek Arcadia at SR 7 12.0 13.2 Mon 9 pm 12.6 11.7 11.0 10.5 10.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1245 PM EDT.
